response:
The provided codebase includes various UI elements, components, and pages for a functional writing software application. The following is a relational schema based on the models present in the codebase:

```
**Database:** writex

**Tables:**

### Projects
| Column | Data Type | Constraints | Description |
|---|---|---|---|
| id | SERIAL | PRIMARY KEY | Unique identifier for the project |
| title | VARCHAR(255) | NOT NULL | Title of the project |
| description | TEXT | NULL | Description of the project |
| image | VARCHAR(255) | NULL | URL of the cover image for the project |
| content | JSONB | NOT NULL | JSON array of page contents |
| created_at | TIMESTAMP | NOT NULL | Timestamp of project creation |
| updated_at | TIMESTAMP | NOT NULL | Timestamp of last project update |
| user_id | INTEGER | NOT NULL | Foreign key referencing the `Users` table |

### Pages
| Column | Data Type | Constraints | Description |
|---|---|---|---|
| id | SERIAL | PRIMARY KEY | Unique identifier for the page |
| project_id | INTEGER | NOT NULL | Foreign key referencing the `Projects` table |
| content | TEXT | NOT NULL | Content of the page |
| created_at | TIMESTAMP | NOT NULL | Timestamp of page creation |
| updated_at | TIMESTAMP | NOT NULL | Timestamp of last page update |

### Users
| Column | Data Type | Constraints | Description |
|---|---|---|---|
| id | SERIAL | PRIMARY KEY | Unique identifier for the user |
| name | VARCHAR(255) | NOT NULL | Name of the user |
| email | VARCHAR(255) | UNIQUE NOT NULL | Email address of the user |
| password | VARCHAR(255) | NOT NULL | Hashed password of the user |
| created_at | TIMESTAMP | NOT NULL | Timestamp of user creation |
| updated_at | TIMESTAMP | NOT NULL | Timestamp of last user update |
```
